english.segment1: I'm in a dangerous place, no direction within. I feel lost in myself, trapped in my skin. It's a critical state, in my mind I can tell. that the future looks dim if I don't get some help. I am lost without You
english.segment2: (CHORUS). Safe in Your arms. When I'm weak, You carry me. I am Safe in Your Arms. You're my strength. You're my safety
english.segment3: Oh, looking back all the years. All the blood sweating tears. There were times it was hard and I fell apart. You're the light at the end, on the road You're a friend. When I wanna give up, You keep showing love. I know I'd be lost without You
english.segment4: With You I'd never walk alone. I know, I know where I belong. 'Cuz You carry me
